metadata.description: The Microsoft Sentinel workspace into which the function will be deployed. Has to be in the selected Resource Group.
The region of the selected workspace. The default value will use the Region selection above.

properties.query:
Syslog
| where Computer startswith "SDWN" or Computer startswith "10."
| where Computer !startswith "10.128.23" and Computer !startswith "10.231.71" and Computer !startswith "10.37.1" and Computer !startswith "10.33.20" and Computer !startswith "10.53.101"
| extend isKVFormat = SyslogMessage startswith "ION_HOST="
| extend Fields = iff(isKVFormat, dynamic([]), split(SyslogMessage, ","))
| extend
    ION_HOST = iff(isKVFormat, extract("ION_HOST=\"([^\"]+)\"", 1, SyslogMessage), ""),
    DEVICE_TIME = iff(isKVFormat, extract("DEVICE_TIME=\"([^\"]+)\"", 1, SyslogMessage), ""),
    MSG = iff(isKVFormat, extract("MSG=\"([^\"]+)\"", 1, SyslogMessage), ""),
    KV_SEVERITY = iff(isKVFormat, extract("SEVERITY=\"([^\"]+)\"", 1, SyslogMessage), ""),
    KV_PROCESS_NAME = iff(isKVFormat, extract("PROCESS_NAME=\"([^\"]+)\"", 1, SyslogMessage), ""),
    KV_FACILITY = iff(isKVFormat, extract("FACILITY=\"([^\"]+)\"", 1, SyslogMessage), ""),
    ELEMENT_ID = iff(isKVFormat, extract("ELEMENT_ID=\"([^\"]+)\"", 1, SyslogMessage), ""),
    MsgTimestamp = iff(isKVFormat, "", tostring(Fields[0])),
    SrcIP = iff(isKVFormat, "", tostring(Fields[1])),
    SrcPort = iff(isKVFormat, "", tostring(Fields[2])),
    DstIP = iff(isKVFormat, "", tostring(Fields[3])),
    DstPort = iff(isKVFormat, "", tostring(Fields[4])),
    Protocol = iff(isKVFormat, "", tostring(Fields[5])),
    SrcZone = iff(isKVFormat, "", tostring(Fields[12])),
    DstZone = iff(isKVFormat, "", tostring(Fields[13])),
    App = iff(isKVFormat, "", tostring(Fields[14])),
    AppCategory = iff(isKVFormat, "", tostring(Fields[15])),
    Description = iff(isKVFormat, "", tostring(Fields[16]))
| extend Computer = iff(isKVFormat and Computer startswith "10.", ION_HOST, Computer)
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, EventTimeUTC = EventTime, HostName, HostIP, Type,
          SeverityLevel, ProcessID, ProcessName, CollectorHostName,
          ION_HOST, DEVICE_TIME, MSG, KV_SEVERITY, KV_PROCESS_NAME, KV_FACILITY, ELEMENT_ID,
          MsgTimestamp, SrcIP, SrcPort, DstIP, DstPort, Protocol,
          SrcZone, DstZone, App, AppCategory, Description, SyslogMessage
